quotes.quote: Mediation on the Holy Scriptures, awakens our mind on Christ Jesus.
Daily mediate and affirm the Scriptures; your mind and soul will be filled with pure thoughts.

Meditation provides a way of learning how to let go. As we sit, the self we've been trying to construct and make into a nice, neat package continues to unravel.
Meditation is the signpost directing the steps to the main highway of realization.
Mediation on the Scriptures will renew your mind.
The mediation of internal conflict can be linkages with other problems.
The spirit of meditation is the combating of self-willed thinking-it is a combat against the weight of one's feelings.
Mediation on the scriptures transforms our lives.
Meditation is to the mind what exercise is to the body it warms and invigorates.
Make your life a prayer. Live your mediation.

Daily mediation on the Holy Scriptures is a spiritual act.
Meditation means dissolving the invisible walls that unawareness has built.

Daily mediation is a healthy spiritual exercise.
